name: Dinosaurs Dominion
description:
Dinosaurs Dominion is a single player experience designed for players who prefer solitary gameplay sessions. Players must overcome ever changing challenges as death will take them back to the start of their journey in this brutal one life system.


The combat of Dinosaurs Dominion is heavily influenced and inspired by souls like games which allows players to lock on to their enemies and strike or dodge incoming attacks.


With a commitment to providing a compact yet replayable experience, Dinosaurs Dominion is tailor-made for individuals leading busy lives. Embrace the thrill of survival without the need for extended gaming sessions.
